sentence.Network_en: It reckons that rationing would ossify the farm industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们认为实行配给制会使农业失去活力。

sentence.Network_en: It is easy for the mind to ossify.
British society tended to ossify and close ranks as the 1930s drew to their close.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国社会在20世纪30年代末期趋于保守和自闭。

ossified societies guard positional goods more , not jealously .僵化的社会更加精心的守护着位置商品，而不是相反。
骨化性纤维瘤(ossifying fibroma):在纵横交错的纤维结缔组织中,见少量新生骨小梁,骨小梁无一定方向排列,小梁旁见少量骨母细胞。 下一篇图库: 软骨粘液纤维瘤(.
中文名:眼眶骨化纤维瘤英文名:ossifying fibroma 别名:青年性眼眶骨化纤维瘤骨化纤维瘤(ossifying fibroma) 是一种常常累及眶骨的后天性纤维骨瘤,好发于颅面骨.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French ossifier, from Latin os, oss- 'bone'

entry.tran: （使）僵化；（使）一成不变；（使）墨守成规
entry.def: If an idea, system, or organization ossifies or if something ossifies it, it becomes fixed and difficult to change.

example.ex: It reckons that rationing would ossify the farm industry...
example.tran: 人们认为实行配给制会使农业失去活力。

example.ex: British society tended to ossify and close ranks as the 1930s drew to their close.
example.tran: 英国社会在20世纪30年代末期趋于保守和自闭。

means.word_mean: 2. make rigid and set into a conventional pattern;
3. cause to become hard and bony;

auth_sentence.content: Doubt...must in the end ossify the higher parts of the mind.
auth_sentence.res_content: Doubt...must in the end ossify the higher parts of the mind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Doubt...must in the end ossify the higher parts of the mind.

auth_sentence.content: Because homeownership tends to ossify things, it can have bad effects on unemployment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Because homeownership tends to ossify things, it can have bad effects on unemployment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Because homeownership tends to ossify things, it can have bad effects on unemployment.

stems_affixes.word_buile: oss骨头+eous表形容词→adj.骨的,多骨的

sentences.en: His thinking has ossified as he’s grown older;he won’t accept new ideas.
sentences.cn: 随着年岁的增长,他的思想僵化了,他不接受新观点。
